documentation.xhtml:p: Calculated cubic feet per minute of material
Number of boxes on the wrapper
True if the wrapper is currently wrapping
True if the boxer is currently boxing
True if the taper is currently taping
True if conveyor_1 is currently conveying
True if conveyor_2 is currently conveying
True if conveyor_3 is currently conveying
True if conveyor_4 is currently conveying
True if conveyor_5 is currently conveying
True if the palletizer arm is moving
Set to true if the bagger is bagging

content.xhtml:p: First state of the first state machine, start boxing if the box maker is on.
Second state of the first state machine, if the box maker is done boxing and the conveyor 1 is on, set conveying_1 to true.
Thrid state of the first state machine, if the ps_1 is on and bagger is on, set conveying_1 to false and set bagging to true.
Fourth state of the first state machine, if the bagger is done bagging and conveyor_2 is on, set conveying_2 to true.
Sixth (and final) state of the first state machine, if ps_2 is false move back to start state.
First state of the second state machine, set conveying_3 to true if ps_3 is true and conveyor_3 is on.
Second state of the second state machine, if ps_4 is true, and taper is on, set taping to true.
Third (and final) state of the second state machine, if taping is false and conveyor_4 is on set conveying_4 to true.
First state of the third state machine, if ps_5 is set to true and palletizer is on and not grabbing/moving, set palletizer_moving to true
Third state of the third state machine, set palletizer_rotation to 225, palletizer_grabbing to true, and palletizer_moving to true if the palletizer is on.
Fifth state of the third state machine. Set palletizer_rotation to 130 and palletizer_moving to true if wrapper_wrapping, wrapper_conveying are false, and palletizer is true.
Seventh state of the third state machine, set palletizer_rotation to 180 degrees, palletizer_moving to true, palletizer_grabbing to false, and add 1 to the box count if palletizer is true.
First state of the fourth state machine, set wrapper_wrapping to true if the wrapper is on, there's no pallet at the end of the conveyor (ps_6 is false) and the box count is equal to 40.
Second state of the fourth state machine, set wrapper_conveying to true if the wrapper is on and it is done wrapping.
Third state of the fourth state machine, set conveying_4 to true if wrapper_conveying is false and conveyor_4 is on.
Fifth state of the first state machine, if ps_2 is on conveying_2 is set to false.
Fourth state of the fourth state machine, if ps_6 is on conveying_5 is set to false.
Second state of the third state machine, if roe_1 is set to true then set palletizer_moving to false
Fourth state of the third state machine, if roe_2 is set to true then set palletizer_moving to false
Sixth state of the third state machine, if roe_3 is set to true then set palletizer_moving to false
